#sidebar SortedSetCommandsSidebar

= ZCARD _key_ (Redis >= 1.1) =
_Time complexity O(1)_

 Return the sorted set cardinality (number of elements). If the _key_ does not
 exist 0 is returned, like for empty sorted sets.

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Integer reply], specifically:

{{{
the cardinality (number of elements) of the set as an integer.
}}}
